long_description: The sleek, comfortable and waterproof Polar Loop activity tracker records your activity 24 hrs. a day, seven days a week and offers guidance to reach your fitness goals. Activity Guide reminds you when you've been still for too long, helping you to stay active all day. Activity Benefit gives feedback about your daily, weekly and monthly activity. Displays daily activity, calories burned, steps taken, time of day. Receive free guidance with the Polar Flow app and Polar Flow web service. The Polar Loop activity tracker is compatible with iPhone 4s and newer, and Polar H6 and H7 Bluetooth Smart heart rate sensors (not included).
